thread.title: Saif Ali Khan confirms daughter Sara Ali Khan’s Bollywood debut | Zee News
thread.title_full: Saif Ali Khan confirms daughter Sara Ali Khan’s Bollywood debut | Zee News

title: Saif Ali Khan confirms daughter Sara Ali Khan’s Bollywood debut | Zee News
text:
Saif Ali Khan confirms daughter Sara Ali Khan’s Bollywood debut By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 08:36 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
Mumbai: Saif Ali Khan has reportedly said his daughter Sara Ali Khan will be launched in Bollywood by producer-director Karan Johar. The pretty young girl will indeed follow in the footsteps of her parents – Saif and Amrita Singh – to pursue a career in acting. 
There has been a lot of buzz about her debut film and if the latest report is anything to go by then Sara will begin her career as an actor with one of KJo’s upcoming films. 
According to a report in MissMalini.com originally attributed to Pinkvilla, Saif has approved Sara’s decision to get into acting. 
“I am very happy to see Sara doing whatever she has her heart set on. We talk constantly and she discusses whatever she wants to and I give her my advice. But eventually it is her decision. I think she is going to (debut with Karan). I am very happy she is working with Karan Johar because I think he is brilliant with newcomers and he will launch her correctly. He is a very intelligent and a passionate filmmaker and he understands films. I am very pleased that she is with him,” Pinkvilla quoted Saif as saying. 
Well, now that Sara’s Bollywood debut is almost confirmed, we wonder when Ibrahim will make a splash on the silverscreen! First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 08:36 More from zeenews
